import java.io.*;import java.util.*;public class Main{    //IO ä¼˜åŒ–    static BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));    static StringTokenizer st;    static String next() throws IOException{        while(st==null||!st.hasMoreElements()) st=new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());        return st.nextToken();    }    static int nextInt() throws IOException{        return Integer.parseInt(next());    }    static PrintWriter out=new PrintWriter(new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out)));    //    static long[] l=new long[214514];//åˆå¹¶ååŒºé—´å·¦å³ç«¯ç‚¹    static long[] r=new long[214514];    static int[] f=new int[214514];//åŸæ¥çš„åŒºé—´åˆå¹¶ååŒºé—´ç¼–å·    static long[] s=new long[214514];//åˆå¹¶ååŒºé—´ 1 åˆ° i çš„è·ç¦»    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException{        long n=nextInt(),k=nextInt();        int cnt=1;        l[cnt]=nextInt();r[cnt]=nextInt();//ä¸€è¾¹è¯»ä¸€è¾¹åˆå¹¶        f[1]=cnt;        for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){            int a=nextInt(),b=nextInt();            if(a>r[cnt]||b<l[cnt]){//å¦‚æœä¸é‡åˆï¼Œè®°å½•æ–°åŒºé—´                cnt++;                l[cnt]=a;r[cnt]=b;            }            else{//å¦‚æœé‡åˆï¼Œåˆå¹¶                l[cnt]=Math.min(l[cnt],a);                r[cnt]=Math.max(r[cnt],b);            }            f[i]=cnt;            s[cnt]=s[cnt-1]+l[cnt]-r[cnt-1];//1åˆ°içš„è·ç¦» = 1åˆ°i-1çš„è·ç¦» + i-1åˆ°içš„è·ç¦»        }        long ans=0;int p=1;        for(int i=1;i<=k;i++){            int x=nextInt();            ans+=Math.abs(s[f[x]]-s[f[p]]);//ç´¯åŠ è·ç¦»            p=x;        }        out.println(ans);        out.flush();    }}
